Eve Tetaz (amụrụ n'afọ 1931) bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke America lara ezumike nká na onye na-ahụ maka udo na ikpe ziri ezi na Washington, DC
E jidere Tetaz ugboro iri na otu n'afọ 2007 maka mmegide obodo na-enweghị ime ihe ike n'oge ngagharị iwe megide agha na mmeri nke Iraq
E jidere ya ihe dịka ugboro iri na abụọ n'agbata afọ 2008 na mmalite afọ 2010.
Tetaz etinyela aka na ọtụtụ òtù udo na ikpe ziri ezi, dịka Code Pink, National Campaign for Nonviolent Resistance na Witness Against Torture.
